videos.headline: Knox bulldozes his way to a TD for Purdue
videos.description: D.J. Knox rolls through the Boston College defense to score Purdue's first touchdown of the day.

videos.headline: Brown connects with Sweeney for 15-yard TD
videos.description: Boston College quarterback Anthony Brown throws to Tommy Sweeney for the Eagles touchdown.

videos.headline: Moore sheds tackle, outruns BC defense for 70-yard TD
videos.description: Purdue's Rondale Moore catches a short pass, escapes a tackle and takes off for a 70-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Moore shakes off BC defense for 9-yard TD
videos.description: Rondale Moore makes a catch and slips away from the Boston College defense to score his second touchdown of the day.

videos.headline: D-lineman Higgins comes up with INT for Purdue
videos.description: Purdue defensive lineman Kai Higgins comes up with a big interception off of a tipped pass to help the Boilermakers regain possession.

videos.headline: Blough targets Wright for 36-yard TD
videos.description: David Blough delivers a 36-yard bomb to Terry Wright for another Purdue touchdown.

videos.headline: Purdue D-Line comes up with second INT
videos.description: Anthony Brown has his pass tipped and intercepted by Purdue's Anthony Watt.

videos.headline: Hard hit on Blough leads to Purdue fumble
videos.description: Boston College's hit on David Blough leads to a fumble recovery by a diving Zach Allen.

videos.headline: Blackmon comes up with another INT for Purdue
videos.description: Boston College's Anthony Brown throws his third interception into double coverage and Purdue's Antonio Blackmon comes down with it.
